author: Harry Craddock
description: Fernet-loving folk will appreciate this herbal digestivo.
name: King Cole Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
